parsed.internal_thinking: I have placed my first settlement at Node 12, which provides Wood (3), Brick (6), and Sheep (5). This is a strong 11-pip opening for building materials. To complement this, I need Wheat and Ore. Looking at my expansion options from Node 12 (neighbors 11, 13, 22), Node 13 is the most strategic direction. From Node 13, I can reach Node 14, which offers Wheat (8) and additional Wood (3, 4). This helps solve my immediate lack of Wheat. Node 11 is also decent (10 pips), but Bob is already at Node 20 and building towards Node 10, which is adjacent to 11, creating potential competition. Node 22 leads toward the Desert (Hex 10), making it the least desirable path. Therefore, I will place my road from 12 to 13 to secure a path toward Node 14. [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: Placed road 12-13. Targeting Node 14 (Wheat 8) for a future settlement. For my second starting settlement, I must prioritize high-yield Ore and Wheat, such as Node 44 (O2, Wh9, Wh6) or Node 33 (Wh9, O3, S4), to balance my resource production.
parsed.say_outloud: I'm placing my road from Node 12 to Node 13. It seems like a natural path for expansion towards some wheat. Good luck with your second placements!
